column4: is there anywhere else I can get ntfs-3g. the reps mentioned here: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=217009/ are coming up with 404s, ign, and err,?
_jaak_: restart your machine and hit esc to get a boot menu. it should give you the option to load the previuos version of the kernel
that i know, but that not really an awnser...
